proposals.title: Forecast Food Grain Production
proposals.problem_statement: Predict future food grain production values using historical area, production, and yield data across different seasons. The dataset contains yearly estimates from 2020-21 to 2024-25 with missing values in earlier years.

proposals.title: Predict Rice Export Values
proposals.problem_statement: Estimate future rice export values to Bangladesh using historical quantity and value data from 2018-19 to 2024-25. The dataset has significant missing values in recent years.

proposals.title: Cluster Crops by Area Trends
proposals.problem_statement: Identify natural groupings of crops based on their area trends from 2015-16 to 2024-25. This could reveal patterns in crop cultivation priorities.

proposals.title: Classify Crops by Yield Patterns
proposals.problem_statement: Develop a model to classify crops into yield categories using historical yield data from 2020-21 to 2024-25. This could help prioritize high-yield crops.

proposals.title: Custom Forecasting: 2024 - 25-Value (USD)
proposals.problem_statement: Predict future rice exports to Bangladesh
proposals.feasibility_notes: Custom task created from user query: Predict future rice exports to Bangladesh
